text: Peeter Volkonski Peeter (also Piotr Andreevich Volkonsky) (born December 9, 1954, in Tallinn, Estonia) is an Estonian actor and rock-musician composer. He is a Prince from the Rurik Dynasty. He is the key art figure in Estonia. Peeter Volkonski is a descendant of an aristocratic princely family, son of Prince Andrei Volkonsky. HSH Prince Pyotr Mikhailovich Volkonsky is a great- great-great-great-grandfather of Prince Peeter Volkonski. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Rock composers Category:Estonian singers Category:Estonian movie actors Category:Rock musicians Category:Princes and princesses Category:Estonian television actors Category:Musicians from Tallinn Category:Estonian composers
title: Peeter Volkonski
